mapper.sql:
critic.id AS critic_id, critic.name AS critic_name, critic.last_name AS critic_lastname, critic.vanity_url AS critic_vanity_url, critic.status AS critic_status, critic.approved_ind AS critic_approved,
critic.image_id AS critic_img_id, critic_img.img_width AS critic_img_width, critic_img.img_height AS critic_img_height, critic_img.format AS critic_img_format, 'c' AS critic_img_type
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM critic LEFT JOIN critic_top ON critic.id = critic_top.critic_id LEFT JOIN critic_img ON critic.image_id = critic_img.id WHERE (critic.id = #{critic_id} OR critic.vanity_url = #{critic_id}) AND critic.deleted_ind = 0

SELECT
FROM critic LEFT JOIN critic_top ON critic.id = critic_top.critic_id LEFT JOIN critic_img ON critic.image_id = critic_img.id INNER JOIN critic_publication_map ON critic_publication_map.critic_id = critic.id WHERE critic_publication_map.publication_id = #{publication_id} AND critic.deleted_ind = 0 ORDER BY critic.name
SELECT id, location, url, bio, details, favorites, quotes FROM critic WHERE (critic.id = #{critic_id} OR critic.vanity_url = #{critic_id}) AND critic.deleted_ind = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount FROM critic WHERE critic.deleted_ind = 0
AND critic.status IN ('LEGACY','ADMIN_PROTECTED_LEGACY')
AND critic.status IN ('CURRENT','ADMIN_PROTECTED_CURRENT')
AND critic.approved_ind = #{tmApproved}
